I’ve been watching the US reaction to the movie by [Al Gore](http://en.wikipedia.org/wiki/Al_Gore) (the man who sorta lost an election to George W. Bush) about climate change – [An Inconvenient Truth](http://www.the-word-is-not-enough.com/blog/rob/2006/06/futurama_may_be_back_but_bende.php) – with interest. I’m especially enjoying this animated response to it from the guys who did [Futurama](http://en.wikipedia.org/wiki/Futurama):
